title: Massive download after patch 8.5
body:
After client restarted to apply patch 8.5, it now shows that I have to download almost 9GB!!??
This is a massive download...Is it really necessary? No wi-fi where I am...this is gonna cost a lot to complete.
Any advice or suggestions welcome

replies.body:
The tooltip on the patch progress bar is a little misleading. It's counting both how much is downloaded AND how much is being changed on the disk. The actual patch size is around 1-2 GB, but there are about 6-7 GB of content changes happening in the game files, hence the reported 9 GB size. Sorry this is confusing. We're going to take a look at it.

**TL;DR:** Actual patch size is only 1-2 GB.

Not sure why, but my bro is having the problem that even after installing the update, it says there is a problem with the installation. 
wtf.
Sir, Now is there any solution for this?

Having the same issue, Would sure be nice if Riot would let us know why we have these huge fricken patches for no reason. Especially when my son across the room from me didnt have it. On a capped cellular internet and have to download 5 gigs is just flat out stupid.
Yup, same here, really weird thing to see. It also seems like the download size gradually (but still really slowly) 'jumps' down in a "few hundreds mb packs".
